name: MetroHi
tag_list: reviews, ratings, listings, social, local, marketing
overview:
MetroHi provides review management services to local businesses.

To improve the exposure of a client business to potential customers, MetroHi creates and fixes listings for it on the top review sites. Clients can monitor their ratings and reviews with a powerful analytics web app and email alerts.

MetroHi’s proprietary software protects against invalid and malicious reviews. Reviews that are incorrect or violate the site’s Terms of Service are flagged and submitted for removal. Clients can see the status of individual reviews in the analytics app.
